root: ^Ah, thanks. I play games with friends pretty often.
^But I also like to work on a lot of various projects here.
^Oh yeah? Tell me about some of them.
^I think I'm most proud of the two game jams I did last year.
^We worked in Godot and I found some ace people to work with!
^Godot was new for me but I really enjoyed working in it.
^There was a lot of excited idea exchanging, and wearing different hats.
^One was a point-n-click + visual novel mash-up with its own art style.
^The other was a concept of a Pikmin-like game in modern society.
^Sounds neat! Do you have a link so I can see them?
^Yeah, I'll open it in a new tab for you!
